## Canopy light and slope

```{r light}
luz <- dats %>%
  filter(variable == "luz")

luz %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = dist, y = median)) + 
  geom_quasirandom() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  stat_poly_eq(formula = y ~ x, parse = T, 
               aes(label = stat(..p.value.label..)))

luz %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>%
  lm(formula = median ~ dist) %>%
  summary()
```

```{r slope}
slope <- dats %>%
```
